description: A better and way more customizable version of Firefox with a great dev and great community.
Its an improvement on an already great browser
Unacceptable! Uses Firefox base version 115 when 128 is available.
very good very good
Clean UI, great vertical tab experience, tons of features - overall just install it instead of it's dad
Hands-down my favourite not only Firefox fork, but browser - period.
Cool app, please add support global menu for kde!

It has a good amount of privacy tools to satisfy me to switch from the official Firefox browser to Floorp instead.

It could be better, but it's good enough.

This Browser is amaizing !  extreamly fast, a ton of new tools and custimization options, way more secure than ANY other Mozilla browser. Now is my default browser in all my systems (including windows)
Nice modification! When I first tried it, loved it immediately. Already equipped with uBlock and vertical tabs, and provides various settings that can be tweaked to my preference.

I have been searching for a browser replacement, since I want to get as far away from Google, Microsoft, Mozilla... I've been using Chromium, Firefox, Waterfox, Icefox, Brave, yada yada. Even Konqueror, Edge... again, blah blah. Nothing has really sastified me thus far, until I stumbled upon this unheard of browser. Has good ratings so downloaded it and gave it a try.

Well, it is now my main browser and the others I have removed, except for Firefox (keeping it just in case I have issues with Floorp, but haven't had any yet). I love the vertical tabs, the customizations, the look, how it functions, the developer features are awesome and inspecting web pages seems to flow so much better through Floorp than it did in Chromium (I haven't used this feature enough to really determine why this is), but I am 100% happy with this browser. I hope they continue to work on it, and keep things updated so that there's little issue using it, but hopefully such updates stick to only what's absolutely necessary, and that it doesn't become bloated.

Highly recommend! I don't care for the name, but it does stick out. Don't let the goofy name fool you. This browser is serious business.
Liked its customizability
Literally just perfect. Mini side tabs are really useful.
Literally just perfect. Mini side tabs are really useful.
If you liked Vivaldi and were looking for an alternative to it which is FOSS, Floorp is a pretty good contender!

wouldn't use on a laptop as everything is too small, but for desktop it's just right
should come with ublock origin by default, since you know, modern web is unusable without it, and every user will install it the moment they get to use this browser
summary: great for just yet another firefox fork

description: This is actually a decent browser, it seems quite fast to me, from now on this is the browser I will be using.
way better than all the other firefox clones, it has actuak unique customisation features only found on floorp and has high performance modes and whatnot, pretty good
This isn't a random fork of Firefox. Developer has done respectable amount of work.
It filled in the gaps of stock Firefox customization. Rounded corners option and configurable bars can make it look like Edge's Project Kodiak but better.

Error code - x00143 - undefined variable
Not sure what this means, but the site loads and works anyways.

I had been searching for an good alternative to firefox (not chromium based) with better customization by default and lot of option to tweek. And finally after years I finally found it. Thanks for making this browser, the werd part is that an AI recomended me this browser
summary: Only unique firefox based browser I found

description: Using Steam Deck/SteamOS accidently clicked on this when trying to grab firefox and now I think i'll keep it! good browser. Its a mod of firefox feels more polished. Nice work!
Works perfectly for months on a Macbook Pro (2015, Intel) with gnome and Fedora Workstation 38

Really great browser. It reminds me of Opera browser but Firefox based. Fast and has build in buttons to change the thme to resemble chrome or others and it even has a Firefox user.js switcher. So many features, and about the same preformance as Firefox it seems.
I swear, Japan just does everything better. I hope this browser stays around for a while. Lovin it!
who up and floorpin their floorp

Im running Fedora Kinoite and since recent software update Google Chrome and MS Edge have problems with sites I visit inc Facebook.
Floorp runs perfectly and im one hundred % happy with it . Based on FF but much better imo

- Sometime in KDE Some stuff broken like (Min,Max,close buttons)

rest perfectly working, just update defualt theme more stabke its broken sometimes
There sure is a reasion why this browser is popular! It does have some bugs and issues with Linux, but the dev is hella active and fixes issues.
summary: needs improvement, but its getting there

description: It works better than firefox. It is faster and the video do not stutter as it does sometime on Firefox.
I dont know how is others reviews, but me with the first install on fedora 39, floorp crash after 3s opened. I mean its not crash its force close without any warning..
My Firefox is experiencing an error in online video players, so I downloaded this browser and it's perfect, and it's even more beautiful and efficient, I really enjoyed it!

This flatpak edition almost gets it right.

Problems.
1) Isn't configured to work well with Wayland out of box.
2) Under Wayland its missing the Min/Max buttons.

The AUR repository version doesn't have these issues. It's a shame this flatpak version does.
Basically Firefox with Vivaldi features. I have it on all my OS.
It is fast, SO customizable, has WEB PANELS (and a NOTES PANEL). It also has the best vertical tabs implementation IMO.

Floorp is a really great Firefox fork, but they've recently included a propreitary submodule in the code. It's allegedly meant to be temporary in order to combat a 'disrecpectful' fork of the project, but this is a very concerning move regardless of intentions.
Certain parts of this fork are closed source. And like any fork that is 100% open source, it is inevitable the project ceases development.
Lightweight, fast and highly customizable firefox fork! imo The "Browser Manager Sidebar" is a must-have in every browser.
Flexible, private, customizable, fast, resourceful, it's great.
Brave on Nobara Linux was running all glitchy and so I tried this browser. With the strict ad blocking and ublock add-on enabled it has equal if not better security functionality.

I'm using Fedora 39 Gnome.
But it's a little bit slow to open.
recommended browser

Schnell, anpassbar und im Gegensatz zu Firefox ein hervorragendes Tab-Management out of the box.
Wer einen Browser auf Firefox Basis möchte, ohne dessen Limitierungen, ist hier gut aufgehoben.
Viele Datenschutz-Addons, coole Themes! Nur dass Google Standardsuchmaschine sein muss, verstehe ich nicht...

Wer Vivaldi schätzt, wird Floorp Lightning gleichfalls schätzen: Er lässt sich stark in vielen Belangen individuell anpassen. Endlich ein Browser auf Firefox-Basis, der sich dem Benutzer anpasst, keine Telemtrie verwendet und übersichtlich und klar aufgebaut ist. Habe ich erwähnt dass er schnell ist? Einfach Klasse!
Los perfiles se borran solos
Lo de arriba lo dice todo
xddddddddddddddddddddddd
summary: no la probe pero de seguro esta mas buena q tu vieja

description: muy recomendado
summary: excelente navegador, va muy bien en linux

description: Va muy bien con la navehación, permite una personalización adecuada para aquellos que no somos desarrolladores, consume pocos recursos, permite sincronizar tu información de otros navegadores (Chrom y FireFox), lo que permite establecer cierta seguridad básica y además es fácil de usar. Muy recomendada
Excelente, es como estar en Firefox un poco achinado.-

El mejor navegador que he encontrado basado en Firefox. Razones.
- Extensiones integradas. Algo que en mi parecer le falta al Firefox. 
- Privado, seguro.
- Rápido y muy pulido, dejaría de ser de origen Japonés. 
Lo he preferido al mismo Firefox que he tenido de base, a LibreWolf, a Brave que es basado en Chromium, a Vivaldi, a Opera...

Avec Floorp, on se trouve avec Firefox+Librewolf prêt à l'emploi avec en suppléments des paramètres installés qui nous facilite le surf et avec en prime la possibilité de modifier l'interface, de créer des web-apps etc
Меня устраивает
На движке от Firefox. Но без "разноцветны поисков по умолчанию"
браузер сбросил все настройки и закладки
После обновления с 10.15.0 на версию 10.16.0 более не запускается.
summary: Браузер отличный, но есть как всегда но..
